name: No Spam In Backend – Remove advertising from your backend
author: Jose Mortellaro

sections.description:
It removes advertising from your backend. Many times, on your request.

This plugin is supported by a community of people who report the plugins that add advertising to the backend.

Many times you activate this plugin and still see spam and advertising. In all those cases, you have to open a thread on the support forum and report the plugin that is adding spam.

We will do the rest and inform you when a new version is available to hide or remove the spam that you reported.

How to report a spam

If you see spam or advertising, don’t hesitate to open a thread on the support forum.
Or join our FB group WP Clean.

What is considered spam

  • Advertising added by a plugin or theme that are on the backend pages that have nothing to do with that plugin or theme
  • Invitations to leave a review if they are on the backend pages that have nothing to do with the plugin or theme that add those invitations, but only if they are not dismissible

What is not considered spam

  • Invitations to leave a review if they are dismissible, no matter the backend page
  • Advertising added by a plugin or theme that are on the backend pages added by that plugin or theme
  • Invitations to leave a review if they are on the backend pages added by that plugin or theme
  • Important notifications that help the user to improve the conditions of the site, also if they are added on backend pages that have nothing to do with the theme or plugin that add the notification

The actual version of No Spam In Backend removes the spam added by the following plugins

  • All In One SEO

Many more plugins coming soon thanks to your request.
